title: Complex conjugate of a vector space
summary: In mathematics, the complex conjugate of a complex vector space V {\displaystyle V\,} is a complex vector space V ¯ {\displaystyle {\overline {V}}} , which has the same elements and additive group structure as V , {\displaystyle V,} but whose scalar multiplication involves conjugation of the scalars. In other words, the scalar multiplication of V ¯ {\displaystyle {\overline {V}}} satisfies
